content.raw:
Thank you for the pull request, @{5e73c1d12354a30c3ba30527} !

We'll give it a try later this week to see if the change in application base class doesn't cause any adverse effects. I remember 2 years ago I [changed](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/commits/5e2f83586c1e5c739c60f4106f3fd85a18351f8e#Lsrc/Iface.ccF56) `QApplication` to `QGuiApplication` on purpose, but I don't remember whether there was a strong reason, and my commit message doesn't help :grimacing: [Your videos](https://community.gazebosim.org/t/gsoc-2020-project-plotting-ui-ignition/513) of Ignition Gazebo working properly with `QApplication` make a strong case for changing it though :wink:
content.html:
Thank you for the pull request, @AmrElsersy !

We'll give it a try later this week to see if the change in application base class doesn't cause any adverse effects. I remember 2 years ago I changed QApplication to QGuiApplication on purpose, but I don't remember whether there was a strong reason, and my commit message doesn't help Your videos of Ignition Gazebo working properly with QApplication make a strong case for changing it though
